events.name: Li-ion battery industry growth
events.wd_description: The Li-ion battery industry is expected to grow as much as ten times its current size in the next 5-10 years.
events.description: The Li-ion battery industry is expected to grow as much as ten times its current size in the next 5-10 years.

events.name: Cobalt supply chain expansion
events.wd_description: The supply chain that feeds materials into the Li-ion battery industry also has to expand at a similar rate.
events.description: The supply chain that feeds materials into the Li-ion battery industry also has to expand at a similar rate.

events.name: Cobalt price increase
events.wd_description: The price of elemental cobalt has more than doubled in the last 12 months to the $50/KG level, primarily due to expectations surrounding battery industry demand.
events.description: The price of elemental cobalt has more than doubled in the last 12 months to the $50/KG level, primarily due to expectations surrounding battery industry demand.

events.name: Lack of significant changes in other industries that use cobalt
events.wd_label: Lack of significant changes in other industries that use cobalt
events.wd_description: The price increase is not attributed to changes in other industries that use cobalt, but rather the expectations surrounding battery industry demand.
events.description: The price increase is not attributed to changes in other industries that use cobalt, but rather the expectations surrounding battery industry demand.

events.name: Li-ion battery industry growth challenges
events.wd_description: Answering whether the supply chain can expand at a similar rate to the Li-ion battery industry is crucial to the future of Li-ion batteries and their ability to solve societal problems.
events.description: Answering whether the supply chain can expand at a similar rate to the Li-ion battery industry is crucial to the future of Li-ion batteries and their ability to solve societal problems.

events.name: Balancing renewables-driven electricity grid
events.wd_description: One aspect of Li-ion battery industry growth is the need for balancing a renewables-driven electricity grid.
events.description: One aspect of Li-ion battery industry growth is the need for balancing a renewables-driven electricity grid.

events.name: Electrifying transportation sector
events.wd_description: Another aspect of Li-ion battery industry growth is the need for electrifying the transportation sector.
events.description: Another aspect of Li-ion battery industry growth is the need for electrifying the transportation sector.

events.name: Battery industry demand
events.wd_description: The expected growth of the battery industry is driving up demand for cobalt, influencing its market price.
events.description: The expected growth of the battery industry is driving up demand for cobalt, influencing its market price.

events.name: Metals market reaction
events.wd_description: The price of elemental cobalt has more than doubled in the last 12 months, driven by anticipated demand from the battery industry.
events.description: The price of elemental cobalt has more than doubled in the last 12 months, driven by anticipated demand from the battery industry.

events.name: Cobalt pricing
events.wd_description: The significant increase in cobalt prices reflects the anticipated demand for cobalt in battery production.
events.description: The significant increase in cobalt prices reflects the anticipated demand for cobalt in battery production.

events.name: Battery industry demand
events.wd_description: The expected growth of the battery industry is driving up demand for cobalt, influencing its market price.
events.description: The expected growth of the battery industry is driving up demand for cobalt, influencing its market price.
